channel.title: How to make dragon claws hit harder on a 317
channel.description: How can I make Dragon Claws hit harder on my 317 server? please for any help i get and it works i will promote you to co-owner and maby even let you code some things please no flamming this is my first server I have ever done thank you!!!!!!!.

item.title: How to make dragon claws hit harder on a 317
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

what about if he wants only the spec to hit harder?
well if you want that, you need your dclaws item ID first. then open client.java. search for your item ID. your result should be something like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAmount -= 50;
dclaws = 3;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
startAnimation(2068);
specOn = false;
}

now if you want to make it ujst a bit more powerful, look at this:

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);

hitdiff is your max hit (i think, somebody correct me if i’m wrong). mis.random(playerMaxHit) means that it will get the player’s best hit and then get a random number out of 0-max hit. now you probably figured this out while reading this. to make it more powerful all you gotta do is:

hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit * 1 + playerMaxHit * 1/2);

the party that we added, " * 1 + playerMaxHit * 1/2 " states that the maximum hit is the playermax hit plus half of the player max hit. for example if your max hit is 30, your max hit with the special will be

30 + 15 = 45

but that’s a bit too overpowerful for dclaws. that’s all you gotta do!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make dragon claws hit harder on a 317
